title: Sierra Leone, Struggling With Ebola, Passes On Africa Summit
teaser: Umaru Fofana of the BBC World Service in Sierra Leone tells NPR's Arun Rath about the Ebola situation and the Sierra Leonean president's decision to stay home from the U.S.-Africa summit.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
